name: Trota Alle Erbette (Trout with Herbs)
author: Deborah Lo Scalzo
summary: A dish that is tasty and easy to prepare. Salmon fillets can be substituted for the trout.
ingredients: 1 cup extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed
½  lemon, juiced, or more as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
4  whole trout, sliced horizontally creating a pocket for filling
directions: Combine olive oil, lemon juice, mint, sage, thyme, salt, and pepper in a bowl; let marinate at least 2 hours
Blend oil mixture with the pine nuts using a blender or mortar and pestle until you have a creamy mixture
If the mixture is too dry, add more oil and lemon juice
Preheat oven to 335 degrees F (170 degrees C)
Place trout on a baking sheet and stuff with the herb-pine nut mixture
Sprinkle onion, more oil, salt, and pepper on the outside of the trout
Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 40 minutes
Pour white wine over trout and let it simmer in the hot pan
